title: Eco-friendly volatile additive enabling efficient large-area organic photovoltaic module processed with non-halogenated solvent
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01405G, Paper
Ziyan Jia, Jiannan Pan, Xu Chen, Yaohui Li, Tianyu Liu, Hanbo Zhu, Jizhong Yao, Buyi Yan, Yang (Michael) Yang
Menthol (MT) can effectively promote ordered molecular arrangement of acceptors in non-halogenated solvent, contributing to the large-area organic photovoltaic modules (19.31 cm2) with a notable power conversion efficiency (PCE) of 15.74%.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
